About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do...

Professional

Hello! My name is Jordan Martin and I am an Application & Web Developer. I graduated from Southeastern Louisiana University with a degree in Computer Science. Since then, I have worked with many clients to improve their web presense. I have also continued my education after university, through online courses and books, picking up new technologies to incorporate into my projects.

Personal

I was born and raised in south Louisiana. I enjoy many hobbies including: Photography, Video Editing, Woodworking, Martial Arts, etc. I love always having something to fill my time with. My greatest strength is my persistance to overcome challenges. I would also say this is my greatest weakness, as it can sometimes lead to over-analysis. I have a fiance, a dog, and family all around me. It really is a good life.

Testimonials

He has been one of the best students in his cohort, and has great personality traits. He has been great in working in teams for projects, and I have never known of any problems with him. He is a responsible and mature individual, always been punctual and conscientious with his work. The variety of projects which he has taken up attest to a diverse skill and diverse interest.

  • Kris Koutsougeras Phd., Louisiana
